snippet: Under threat, activists in Egypt fear the interior minister wants to turn the clock back to 2010, when the police had total control of the streets.
abstract: Under threat, activists in Egypt fear the interior minister wants to turn the clock back to 2010, when the police had total control of the streets.

headline.main: Activists Fear Egypt's Police Force, First Target of Protests, Is Out for Revenge
